name: Hotel Les Ambassadeurs
description:
Comfortable Accommodations: Hotel Les Ambassadeurs in Oran offers air-conditioned rooms with private bathrooms, city views, and free toiletries. Each room includes a work desk, TV, and free WiFi.

Dining Experience: The family-friendly restaurant serves lunch and dinner in a traditional and modern ambience. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast and relax in the outdoor seating area.

Convenient Facilities: The hotel features a lounge, lift, 24-hour front desk, concierge service, child-friendly buffet, coffee shop, and room service. Additional amenities include free on-site private parking, bicycle parking, and walking tours.

Prime Location: Located 12 km from Ahmed Ben Bella Airport and 6 km from Oran Santa Cruz fortress, the hotel provides easy access to local attractions.

reviews.title: Amazing value for money
reviews.positiveText: Spacious room and bathroom, all spotlessly clean, nice nostalgic decoration of the common areas. Great location - close to a tram stop, 5min walk to cable car, 10min to city centre and 15min to the train station. Friendly personnel
Clean

reviews.title: Frendliest people in Oran
reviews.positiveText:
Everything was amazing, but the amability of the people working there was on a whole another level.
I am 100% sure that this hotel has the frendliest staff you can find in all of Oran and probably in Algeria.

reviews.title: Nice hotel, very kind staff
reviews.positiveText: The hotel is located in city center , near all the major sights. The tram station to other parts of the city stops in front in the hotel.

reviews.title: Decent hotel with a few quirks
reviews.negativeText:
No desk in rooms. Shower took ages to heat up and never really became as warm as one might wish. Breakfast buffet was not very inspiring.
One important issue: all other hotels we stayed in in Algeria cheerfully allowed us to settle the bill with local currency in cash  during our stay. This hotel wanted payment in advance by credit card, which is fiddly (you need to pay via a special app as they can't charge a foreign card directly). It also means you have to pay the least advantageous exchange rate!
reviews.positiveText: Quite posh lounge area, comfortable to sit in and read or work. Pretty good location, fairly central and a few minutes' walk from a tram stop. Rooms and beds basically comfortable.

reviews.title: Poor breakfast, no wifi in the room
reviews.negativeText: WiFi didn’t work in the room, the breakfast was very poor (just bread, croissants, no ham, no cheese, no eggs, no fruit).
reviews.positiveText: Good location

reviews.negativeText: There was no functioning internet on the second floor. I reported this several times and nothing was done about it. I even told them it was simply a case of resetting the modem in the corridor but still nothing was done.

reviews.title: A good choice in central Oran
reviews.negativeText: The hotel gives from Rue de l' Independence a neglected and abandoned impression, the former entrances are locked, access is via the parking lot on Blvd. Palestine. The lighting is not sufficient for reading. Wifi weak and unreliable. Occasional kitchen smells.
reviews.positiveText: Good and centrally located mid-range hotel in Oran, beautiful spacious lobby, spacious room (301), marble floor, pretty and elegant decor, comfortable bed, refrigerator, large bathroom with shower, decent breakfast; good but unfortunately hardly frequented restaurant

reviews.title: Good value for the money and the location + helpfull stuff makes it definitely worth it to stay ther
reviews.negativeText: Missed some vegetables or fruits for breakfast, even though the omelette offered to us by the stuff was great. As in the whole country, if you don't speak Arabic or French, communication can be difficult.
reviews.positiveText: The location of the hotel is great, you can get to different places of Oran just by walking. The stuff was very friendly and always willing to help.

reviews.negativeText:
Mettre fait voler , avoir refusé le prépaiement avec la carte.a réclamer du liquide demande sans arrêt de rajouter des billets (je connaissais pas la valeur)ai donné 19fois 2000 dinars+651 aux total 38651 dinars donc 264.70€uro alors que je devais 2 nuit avec un total 126€ il a multiplié par 2 la facture.
En plus il a le culot de réclamer encore de argent.
Ai la facture que ai obtenu difficilement car il refuse la carte bancaire des 2 nuits

name: LE PALME HOTEL
description:
Comfortable Living Space: Kha Nguyen Apartment 2-Near Hoi An Old town in Hoi An offers a one-bedroom apartment with a garden, terrace, balcony, and free WiFi. The apartment includes air-conditioning, a kitchenette, washing machine, and a work desk.

Modern Amenities: Guests enjoy a fully equipped kitchen, dining table, TV, and private entrance. Additional amenities include a hairdryer, electric kettle, refrigerator, and wardrobe.

Prime Location: Located 31 km from Da Nang International Airport, the apartment is a short walk from Assembly Hall of Chaozhou Chinese Congregation and Hoi An Historic Museum. Nearby attractions include Japanese Covered Bridge and Marble Mountains.

Guest Satisfaction: Highly rated for its friendly host, convenient location, and suitability for city trips.

reviews.title: Incredible stay
reviews.positiveText:
Wow, what an incredible stay! Right across the bridge in a beautiful quiet area yet so close to old town. Facilities were perfect for what we were after and we loved having a washing machine and kitchen area to make it feel more like home. 
It was so easy to book tours and pickups through Ms Vy. She provided amazing local recommendations and the most incredible tailor! Highly recommend this place. Can’t wait to come back.

reviews.title: Very nice place to stay
reviews.positiveText:
One of the best accomodation we had in Vietnam. 
The host is very nice and helping with everything. So we really appreciete all the help with tailors, with motorbike service, with all advices etc. Really good!
Then the room is very nice, you are just few steps from Hoi An old town, but you are in the calm street so no problem with noise. In fact it was so great!! And when you need to go to old town, you just go 0,5 km?
Equipment all nice, working.

reviews.title: Almost like home
reviews.positiveText:
If you need to feel like home during your travels, this us the right place for you. You have whole studio with little kitchen and bathroom. There is a washing machine for free, also possibility of having bicycles for free. 
Mrs Vy is amazing, super welcoming, she even made a dinner for us on the first day. 
The location is just across the bridge from Old town but in quiet place (approx 8 minutes walking).
This place was exactly like the photos. Lovely place and near the old town, only a short walk to the river.

Spacious studio appartment w. terrace, very good aircon, free bicyles  in a quiet neighborhood but very close to old town. Vy was a great host, very responsive and flexible as regards to check-out time. She organized airport/station transfer which was great and actually cheaper than Grab taxi. Would definitely stay there again.

reviews.title: We loved our stay at Vy”s place, Vy was brilliant and helped us enormously we would highly recommend a stay here
reviews.negativeText: There was nothing not to like about this property
reviews.positiveText: Great location, great host and beautiful large clean apartment

reviews.title: Great welcome ,lovely host, marvellous place to stay
reviews.negativeText: End of rainy season,November in Hoi An,and parts of town flooded,ankle deep in places.But fully expected for time of year.
reviews.positiveText: Wonderful location ,great host ,facilities excellent.will recommend to friends and family and hope to return.

reviews.title: Would recommend to stay. I would come back here
reviews.positiveText:
Owner was very kind and lovely. Given water and watermelon upon arrival

They have a really friendly dog 

Very clean

Great location, walking distance to centre 

Beautiful accomodating and sparkling clean

Thought host, owner had stocked the place with water, soft drinks and beer which were not marked up, they were convenience store price
This property is incredible! You must stay here ☺️ great location, amazing host and everything you could need

reviews.title: PLEASE READ BEFORE BOOKING A STAY IN HOI AN
reviews.positiveText: This is the most amazing place to stay, Vy the owner was contactable via WhatsApp to arrange time for key collection. I arrived here after a MASSIVE day and was so exhausted, Vy greeted me with a cold water and fresh pineapple while she ran me through how to use the keys and the general information of the property. She noticed I was very tired and arranged to get me a Bahn Mi delivered for dinner, she is so friendly and will help you with anything you need. Please note that this apartment is on the same property as their family home and to be respectful. I’m going to recommend this place to all my friends it’s a great location walking distance to most hot spots. If you don’t feel like walking Vy has pushbikes free for you to use or she can organise a scooter for you. This place is 11/10 Vy goes above and beyond for you. Definitely recommend!!

name: Calypso Home Oran
description:
Comfortable Accommodations: Calypso Home Oran in Oran offers comfortable bedrooms with air-conditioning, private bathrooms, and garden or city views. Each room includes a work desk, minibar, and free WiFi.

Dining Experience: The family-friendly restaurant serves Italian, Mexican, pizza, seafood, and international cuisines in a modern and romantic ambience. Guests can also enjoy a coffee shop and barbecue area.

Convenient Facilities: The property features a terrace, garden, and free on-site private parking. Additional amenities include a minimarket, hairdresser, and full-day security.

Prime Location: Located 33 km from Ahmed Ben Bella Airport and 16 km from Oran Santa Cruz fortress, Calypso Home Oran provides easy access to local attractions. Highly rated for its attentive staff and comfortable beds.

pricing.room_type: Deluxe Double Room with Balcony  and Partial Sea View
Double or Twin Room with City View

reviews.positiveText: I didn't stayed at this place and thanks God I didn't someone called me from this shitt hotel and said that I have to cancel my stayed because they have family waiting and he was so rude with me
Very good staff

reviews.title: Great stay with nice and beautiful peoples
reviews.positiveText: Staff , the Was there ( I think her name Turki) was very nice , really very helping
I fully recommend the place to all travelers going to Oran. Dunia is friendly and available to assist visitors anytime to make their stay unforgettable.
Everything alright
everything

reviews.title: I will staying there again.
reviews.positiveText: good service, decoration better than most of hotels in ain truk. and good price.

reviews.title: Friendly staff and good sized room.
reviews.positiveText: All staff members were very friendly and helpful.
location wasn’t that bad

reviews.title: Moche
reviews.positiveText: Il n’y a pas eu de petit dejeuner

name: 2H Hotel
description:
Elegant Accommodation: 2H Hotel in Oran offers a 5-star experience with spa facilities, a sauna, terrace, restaurant, and free WiFi. Guests enjoy air-conditioned rooms with private bathrooms, city views, and modern amenities.

Comfortable Amenities: The hotel features a rooftop pool, hot tub, and spa bath. Additional facilities include a fitness room, steam room, hammam, and free on-site private parking. Family rooms and a kids' pool cater to all guests.

Dining Experience: A modern, family-friendly restaurant serves French and seafood cuisine with halal options. Lunch and dinner are available, complemented by a coffee shop and child-friendly buffet.

Prime Location: Located 11 km from Ahmed Ben Bella Airport and 6 km from Oran Santa Cruz fortress, the hotel provides easy access to local attractions.

reviews.title: Much hiking, cause the accommodation was so high.
reviews.negativeText: I did not know that the property is so high in the mountains, I couldn't find any information about it!

reviews.title: Un panorama mozzafiato
reviews.negativeText: La lavatrice non funzionava, ma il proprietario ci ha detto che la prossima settimana installerà quella nuova
reviews.positiveText: La terrazza è un paradiso. Una vista mozzafiato. Vale il viaggio.

reviews.title: Paradiso nel paradiso
reviews.negativeText: Niente. Sarebbe opportuno cambiare la lavatrice, perché la centrifuga a volte lascia i vestiti fradici e soprattutto fa un baccano infernale 🤣, ma basta organizzarsi e accenderla subito prima di andare in spiaggia 😉
reviews.positiveText: Tutto. Il paesaggio mozzafiato su Lipari e Vulcano che potevamo goderci mentre mangiavamo ed in qualsiasi altro momento, la pace e riservatezza totali,  la comodità di tante piccole cose (l'amaca e le sdraio, la doccia anche all'esterno, la stanza da letto ampia e fresca). Il fatto che non mancasse niente. La strada per raggiungere la casa è un po' tortuosa ed a tratti ripida, e richiede uno scooter o un'auto a benzina, ma è talmente BELLA che dopo due giorni in cui ci siamo abituati è diventata un valore aggiunto della casa. Alfredo è stato gentilissimo e disponibile per ogni nostra esigenza.
Panorama,

reviews.title: Splendida villetta nella pace della campagna
reviews.negativeText:
I cali di tensione nelle luci del bagno
Connessione wifi a bassa velocità
La strada difficoltosa per raggiungerla
reviews.positiveText:
Vista panoramica
Silenziosità
Pulizia
Attrezzatura della cucina completa
Lavatrice in loco
Amaca e sdraio per godere del panorama
Ombrellone per gli ospiti per la spiaggia

reviews.title: Casa dolce casa 🏡
reviews.positiveText: Una bellissima casetta, curata nei dettagli, non manca di nulla. Intima e tranquilla Gestore gentilissimo. Posizione strategica per visitare l'isola

reviews.negativeText: La struttura è in una contrada a circa 300mt d'altitudine e fiancheggia quello che era il vulcano dell'isola. L'ultimo tratto di strada si presenta in parte sterrato, ripido e stretto. Sconsigliato a chi non è un abile guidatore.
reviews.positiveText: Terrazzino con vista superlativo, privacy ed host cordiale e disponibile
